name: Pirate fishing
description:
In the exciting game "Pirate fishing" you play as a fisherman and your task is to catch as many fish as possible to earn a lot of money.

Not satisfied with the pace of production? Spend money on pumping your fishing rod:

- Controllability - the higher, the easier it is to control the direction of movement of the fishing hook.
- The length of the reel affects the depth from which you can catch fish.
- Speed - affects how fast you can get the prey out of the water.
- Fishing time - increase the duration of fishing.
- Dexterity - increase your level, the higher, the easier it will be to catch a fish.
- Bait - Raise the bait level in order to attract more fish species.

Pump up your fishing rod and try to set a record for catching fish every time!
